about_the_game:
Zone 13 is a psychological horror, first-person walking simulator that plunges you into the chilling depths of various eerie environments. Your task is to find anomalies, escape the endless loop, and uncover the dark secrets of Zone 13. The game immerses you in a tense and atmospheric experience, where dynamic anomalies challenge your perception.

Explore multiple haunted locations, each with its own unique horrors and mysteries. Can you break free from the horrors of Zone 13?

Key Features:
  • Atmospheric Horror: Experience deeply immersive environments that evoke a sense of dread and tension.
  • Dynamic Anomalies: Encounter environmental changes that alter your perception of each location, challenging your sanity and survival.
  • First-Person Perspective: Immerse yourself fully in the chilling world of Zone 13 with a first-person viewpoint.
  • Escape the Loop: Find anomalies and escape the endless loop to survive each terrifying map.

Prepare yourself for a psychological horror experience like no other. Will you escape the looping nightmares of Zone 13?

More maps and horrors coming soon!

name: Zone 13

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Find anomalies, escape the endless loop, and uncover the dark secrets of Zone 13.
